citat: Instinct is a major component in confidence, competence and inteligence, so it's a good idea not to damage or wrap your child
What can get in the way are things like our own lack of confidence, our pessimism, our defences, which block our feelings, and our fear of being overwhelmed by feelings
Life is hard and you're doing your best, so try not to beat yourself up for everyday mistakes
It's a way you have learned to defend yourself from feeling what you felt at their age
